author: Anonymous Atom
title: Abstract function build-list
question: Hi, I was just wondering if build-list can be used to build lists with more than just numbers?
student_answer:
Yes, and you can check 2021w1-mt2/mt2-p3
From the language tab on edX:
(@signature Natural (Natural -> X) -> (listof X))
;; produces (list (f 0) ... (f (- n 1)))
(define (build-list n f) ...)
So yes, build-list makes a list of a function applied to numbers.
